attributes.action: suspend aid to Sudan for the same number of days that Gillian Gibbons is held in custody
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Mrs Gibbons has now been released.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stopsudanaid/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
